title: Today starting rebuilding SteamBot from scratch

cells.data:
Tuesday June 20th, 2017 12:37am
Have started today to rebuild steambot from scratch

First step is to use green box as subsitute for steamBot and red box to indicated the ground.
Have added physics to both so that bot drops with gravity. Have used physics impulse to simulate driving the bot into the air.

I am home full time due to my motorcycle accident, so I have plenty of time to do this.
